BlowFishKey

ISymmetricKey
BlowFishKey

BlowFishKey

An Actionscript 3 implementation of the BlowFish encryption algorithm, as documented at http://www.schneier.com/blowfish.html Copyright © 2007 Henri Torgemane

Derived from

The Bouncy Castle Crypto package, Copyright © 2000-2004 The Legion Of The Bouncy Castle (http://www.bouncycastle.org)

See LICENSE.txt for full license information.

encryptBlock

private function encryptBlock(src: ByteArray,
srcIndex: uint,
dst: ByteArray,
dstIndex: uint):void

Encrypt the given input starting at the given offset and place the result in the provided buffer starting at the given offset.  The input will be an exact multiple of our blocksize.

decryptBlock

private function decryptBlock(src: ByteArray,
srcIndex: uint,
dst: ByteArray,
dstIndex: uint):void

Decrypt the given input starting at the given offset and place the result in the provided buffer starting at the given offset.  The input will be an exact multiple of our blocksize.
